name: Sacrifices Must be Made to the Dragon!
name_original: Sacrifices Must be Made to the Dragon!
description:
Keep the dragon fed with your peasants while you bide your time making a large enough army to defeat them!

Click to sent your peasants out to gather resources, making sure to keep the dragon well fed. Once you end the day, you'll need to make some tough choices about who to sacrifice, and hope that who you spare pays off in the end!
